overview: The inside of Noble Planta, Ched and Maria Markovic’s shop on Twenty-eighth Street, in Manhattan, is a green world, full of leafy, spiky vegetation. “Noble Planta” conveys a lot about the dynamics of both the Markovics’ business partnership and their forty-year marriage.
tagline: Listening to your plants may be easier than listening to your loved ones.
title: Noble Planta
